Question.Subject: Can you give me a few tips for my first BLOG?
Question.Content:
http://www.wordsosweet.blogspot.com/
please check it out and tell me anything you think good and bad crituqes apprecitated. thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
hi followed your blog can you follow mines too please
i liked how you talked about things that are like happening to people everyday. Like the one about dancing at a club and in the back of your mind your to old for this stuff, im sure that happens to people alot of the times.

Answer.Content: Not bad. You could make your blog more attractive by using some different templates. Also you could add some widgets to your blog. Make a google search to find more about blogging tips and tricks. You could also get some nice templates for Free. Some websites I refered were: bloggertipsandtricks.com, bloggertricks.com
Answer.Reference: By creating my first blog: http://mobiedge.blogspot.com

Answer.Content:
hi followed your blog can you follow mines too please
i liked how you talked about things that are like happening to people everyday. Like the one about dancing at a club and in the back of your mind your to old for this stuff, im sure that happens to people alot of the times.
